title: MNTN CEO: WBD's Ad Sales Could be a ‘Hidden Gem' for Netflix
description: Mark Douglas, MNTN CEO, says Warner Bros. has a well established advertising business, while Netflix is still building its ad platform. He tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close” that Warner Bros.’ ad sales team could be a hidden gem if Netflix wins the acquisition battle. (Source: Bloomberg)
